editorialNotes.standard: It’s become our go-to way (and word) for connecting with people in other places. Featuring elegant design, reliable performance and constantly evolving features.

editorialNotes.standard: This digital notepad and PDF markup tool covers all the bases. Create notes with your keyboard or Apple Pencil: the app transforms your hand-drawn shapes into perfect ones, and can even convert your handwriting to text.
editorialNotes.short: Go paperless with ease and enjoy the handwriting recognition feature.

editorialNotes.standard: Find and pin creative ideas creative ideas with this wonderfully designed app, alongside collaborative boards, built-in messaging and other helpful features to help you visually explore what matters to you.
editorialNotes.short: Discover, search and save inspiring ideas for your next projects.

editorialNotes.standard: We rely on this sleek, powerful notetaker to annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations and more. With built-in iCloud support, it’s perfect for keeping notes, documents and doodles up to date across devices.
editorialNotes.short: Annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations and more.

editorialNotes.standard: This app offers the flexibility you’ve always wished for when taking notes on longer documents. Quickly drag excerpts to a separate workspace, make comments, compare distant sections and more. You’ll forget how you ever read without it.

editorialNotes.standard: Powered by the same code base that drives the iconic desktop image editor, the iPadOS version adds a customisable interface optimised for touch and Apple Pencil. Explore all that’s new with lessons on masking, composites and more.

editorialNotes.short: Order food to your doorstep and get updates from Siri.

editorialNotes.standard: A sleek interface and robust tools transform potato-quality images into stunning works of art with a few taps, along with the freedom to experiment without damaging the original photo.
Give your brain a break with this digital notepad for logging your thoughts. Create private pages for lists, diaries and random thoughts, or shared ones to collaborate with friends and colleagues.

Few things are more relaxing than settling down with a good coloring book—at least, until the kid we borrowed it from asks for it back. Pigment unleashes our grown-up creative energy with a surprisingly deep array of artist’s tools and tweaks. It even lets us automatically color within the lines, giving our productions a sheen of perfection. We expect a call from the gallery any day now.
editorialNotes.short: Get cracking with colours.

editorialNotes.standard: Here’s a simple truth: we don’t work with documents on mobile the same way we do on desktop. So it makes sense that Microsoft reimagined Office for a uniquely mobile experience where being productive feels frictionless.
editorialNotes.short: Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
